## MIMIC

![](images/mimic.webp)

_Beasts that look like objects._

**AC** 12, **HP** 23, **ATK** 2 bite +5 (1d8 + stick), **MV** near, **S** 2 **D** 0 **C** 1 **I** -2 **W** 0 **Ch** -3, **AL** N, **LV** 5

**Stick:** DC 15 STR or adhere to target; auto-hit with bite. DC 15 STR on turn to remove.
